overview:
Alycia Kaback connects the dots for people who want to be in the entertainment business with the people who can help them - through networking events.

An unstoppable faith in her own ability has helped Alycia Kaback become a rising female producer and entrepreneur. As founder and CEO of The â€œITâ€ Factor Productions and VIP Talent Connect, LLC. Alycia also serves as investor and advisor to Colby Models a recognized boutique fashion agency in NYC.

Alycia Kaback: producing credits include: The Model Diaries NYC (Pre Production) VIP Reality Project, VIP NYC (Three Episodes), The Mandela Maker (Short Film) and serves on the board of directors of Revolution YES a not for profit organization that helps find children and individuals that are making a difference in the world. Alycia also recently served as MC for the 25th Anniversary Israel Film Festival Sponsor Dinner. Alycia was also recently interviewed on WOR Radio in NYC by legendary talk host Valerie Smalldone. Her upcoming schedule includes the inaugural VIP Film Festival in NYC in addition to working on a book about how to get noticed as an actor or musician. Alycia is also actively involved in numerous charities and speaking engagements throughout the year.
